statements: UPDATE candidate_tags SET skill_tag='Python', experience_tag='Intermediate' WHERE candidate_id=1;
UPDATE candidate_tags SET experience_tag='Advanced', role_tag='Backend Developer' WHERE candidate_id=2;
UPDATE candidate_tags SET skill_tag='Java', experience_tag='Intermediate' WHERE candidate_id=100;
UPDATE candidate_tags SET role_tag='Software Engineer', experience_tag='Advanced' WHERE candidate_id=200;
UPDATE candidate_tags SET name='John Doe', skill_level=3 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE role_tags SET skill_required='Python', suitability_level=5 WHERE role_name='Developer';
UPDATE candidate_tags SET skill_level = 5, name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE role_tags SET suitability_level = 3, role_name = 'Developer' WHERE skill_required = 'Python';
UPDATE candidates SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE candidates SET skills = '{"programming": "Python", "design": "Photoshop"}', email = 'jane.smith@example.com', name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE candidates SET skills = '{"programming": true, "data_analysis": false}', name = 'John Doe' WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
UPDATE candidates SET email = 'jane.smith@example.com', name = 'Jane Smith', skills = '{"design": true, "communication": true}' WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE Candidates SET email='newemail@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE candidate_id='f4d50225-36c1-4f71-b857-98334ae47b65';
UPDATE Roles SET responsibilities='Lead development projects, manage team dynamics' WHERE role_name='Lead Developer';
UPDATE Candidates SET first_name = 'Alice', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE candidate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Tags SET tag_name = 'Management' WHERE tag_id = 1;
UPDATE candidates SET skills = ARRAY['JavaScript', 'HTML', 'CSS'], suitability_score = 0.85 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE roles SET required_skills = ARRAY['Python', 'SQL'], max_experience_years = 5, min_suitability_score = 0.7, role_name = 'Software Engineer' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE candidates SET experience_years = 5, suitability_score = 0.8 WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE roles SET min_experience_years = 3, max_experience_years = 7, min_suitability_score = 0.5 WHERE id = 456;
